website_summaries.verdict: This smart safe can work with a smartphone app that allows you to track the safe's usage from a distance.
pros: Well designed interior – particularly for hand gun storage
App allows you to unlock the safe and alerts you when your safe is being tampered with
Includes manual keys as well as a smart key
cons: Biometrics on this model can only store 20 unique fingerprints, which is fewer than many models on the market

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year, Overpriced and un reliable
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your money on this safe like I did. The safe itself was okay when I first purchased it, but at 11 months it no longer opens with my finger print. The battery is fully charged, I enrolled the same finger in multiple profiles to overcome any scan issues. The mechanism itself is no longer releasing the door, which I find useless in a gun safe. For this amount of money, you shouldn't expect to run into problems in the first year. It's overpriced and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: mason

customer_reviews.title: Highly unreliable fingerprint sensor
customer_reviews.text: The first Vaultek Pro MXi High Capacity Biometric safe box I received had previously been opened. Eventually found out why -- the fingerprint sensor did not work. Received a replacement, and it had the same issue. Terrible fingerprint sensor and quality control. And yes, I know what I'm doing. I successfully set up other Vaultek safes with similar or same fingerprint sensors.
customer_reviews.author: lovedogs

customer_reviews.title: The app’s battery level and tamper detection feature is very good.
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish is great, I thought the display screen could be a little better also an inch or two better clearance for drawing the gun from the below level below, right now you have to draw at more of a angle to get the gun out. But really not a big deal. Overall this safe is great! I also included picture of both my Vaultek VT20i and my MXi Series safe for size comparison. Be careful with the mobile app unlock feature the key fob and also the keys.. Just be thoughtful to keep these things that can all unlock the safe in a secure location.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Unlocking Mechanism failed in the second year of ownership.
customer_reviews.text: The safe worked fine for the first full year - unlocking easily with my fingerprint. Battery life was good too, so, overall, seemed like a good purchase. However, the safe now fails to unlock because the unlocking mechanism is faulty - as other reviews have noted. I have contacted Vaultek's customer support, and will likely make this a one star rating if they do not remedy the issue - at the moment, their product is essentially a black metal box that does not unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Super convenience, supreme quality and good space.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Vaultek product for a while. I think this brand is like the Apple in the safe industry. They make the technology fit perfect for people's everyday need. Fingerprints, keypad, or key fob, each way is very convenient to access the safe quick and easy. The safe is heavy and solid built. And it has a very good battery life. It's has been 2 month I've only charged once and still it shows more than half battery remain. It is ideal for 2-6 pistol storage.
customer_reviews.author: Will Xu

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe. Very high build quality and it has some really great features. The only reason for a 4 star instead of 5 is the internal dimensions. I purchased the safe as a replacement for another brand that houses my nightstand/bump in the night handgun (FNX 45 w/ TLR-H1). Unfortunately I cannot put the pistol in the stand and use the drawer as it is too tall. When pulling the Glock 19 from the stand it hits the drawer but still fits. If this safe was like 2" taller it would be perfect for my needs. I would still absolutely recommend it. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing safe specially for compact pistols
customer_reviews.text: This safe is amazing just take in consideration this safe is a shelf safe so you need to installed in a flat surface, it comes with a removable tray and the holder for 2 guns, is the gunnis a “full size you may have an issue pulling them out my Springfield Armory 1911 with a compensator barely lots in the holder with out a mag, couple more inches higher as deeper and this would be perfection
customer_reviews.author: Romel

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line safe
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this safe is top notch, was exactly what we were looking for. Very spacious interior and finish is outstanding. The slide out drawer is very well made and very useful. Rechargeable battery last along time on a charge. I was looking for a secure safe to hold multiple guns and ammo that had a biometric reader, and this biometric reader works very well, having a numeric pass code option was was icing on the top. The safe also has a tamper alarm incase someone tries to mess with the safe when armed. Very happy with the purchase and recommended this safe to those looking for the highest quality and reliable security.
customer_reviews.author: Slabrider

customer_reviews.title: I like the interior shelf
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint recognition is a bit inconsistent, but acceptable. I like the interior shelf, the interior organizational options and the size. The interior lighting is also a plus and better than other safes of this kind that I have used. I also like that this safe has four "open" options - numeric, fingerprint, key and remote. Customer support was excellent. I had issues with the fingerprint recognition on the first one that I purchased, and a replacement was sent within days. The replacement works to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schiowitz

customer_reviews.title: Love the safe, size is just a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this safe, I just wish it was a bit bigger for price. Not a lot of wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with it. The thumb reader can be better, and improve Bluetooth range.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. No other words for my new safe. It is the best safe hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chukala

customer_reviews.title: A gun safe worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: By far the best hand gun safe on the market
customer_reviews.author: gil

customer_reviews.title: Premium Protection
customer_reviews.text: Biometrics work flawlessly, solid construction and multiple entry options are what I love about this safe. Set up went without issue...well done Vaultek!
customer_reviews.author: Rambler

customer_reviews.title: Hi tech safe! Very reliable 😁
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe. Hope VAULTEK makes a rifle sized one.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Empress with the product. Will purchase another safe from them. Batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Darell D. Ruda

customer_reviews.title: Quality safe!
customer_reviews.text: Got it to me fast. The build quality is fantastic. It’s easy to use and very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: not working out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I open the box, insert the battery and the #6 button will not illuminate. Amazon won't fix the problem and been on the phone with customer service way too long. regretting this purchase very expensive safe that doesn't work day one
customer_reviews.author: mark kyser

customer_reviews.title: Holds Nine of my Hanguns ... Enough Said
customer_reviews.text: With three modular pistol racks I can store my: Colt Defender 1911, CZ P07, Sig Sauer M11-A1, Wilson Combat Beretta 92g Centurion, Browning 22 1911, and Sig Sauer P938. The top shelf stores my Ruger 5.5” Customized Redhawk and Coonan 357 Classic with enough room left for my Bond Arms derringer. This is a well- throughout designed handgun safe loaded with fantastic features you can customize to meet your own needs. It is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this safe for over 2 years now. It has worked fine for the first year, it started giving me problems going into the second year, ie won’t open, won’t detect my finger, etc. Now into year 3 and the thing unlocks with my finger or code but the door doesn’t unlatch. It takes several tries and banging on the door to get it open. I can’t imagine getting to this thing in an emergency. Don’t waste your money. Look elsewhere. This thing is a joke especially at this cost.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny S

customer_reviews.title: VAULTEK safe
customer_reviews.text: This my second safe I have both, this one is for my daughter so she can secure her gun! But still have quick access to her gun in a emergency! I like the way you can organize to your liking, it has many options! Great product and customer service on top, really like this product, and would highly recommend this product to anyone who looking for great gun safe!!
customer_reviews.author: David Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Great safe. I would highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy safe. Large enough to hold 7 handguns and extras, but also compact enough to store in bedroom without disrupting decor. Easy to use button combination to open. Number keys light up automatically. Safe is equipped with motion/disturbance alarm, but can be disabled (which we chose to do).
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe is expensive, however, it is completely worth it. The safe is high quality, heavy duty and everything I expected. There are a lot of add ons for the safe which is great. It also has a lot of bells and whistles, however, if you want to keep it simple you can do that too. I just wish I hadn’t waited so long to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid -
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. I got the one without the fingerprint option/biometrics - I can get into it very quickly with a code - the numbers light up as soon as you touch the safe - great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe but
customer_reviews.text: WiFi functionality would not work, customer service was very helpful and fast to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality product that is perfect for several handguns and a few valuables. It is easy to program and well built. Packaging was superb. A bit expensive, but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and just order it! Took a few days to find a home for it because of its size, but it is perfect for my needs. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sexiest piece of furniture in the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This foreboding piece of engineering and technology is also sexy. The carrying straps that came with it told me that the makers want me to take care of my new investment and not hurt myself nor blemish the new home of my firearms. This masterpiece is a beast and bruiser. The instructions are clear and concise.. I had this thing setup, bolted in place, occupied with weaponry, and had my wife schooled on its operation in a little over an hour. This is the fourth handgun safe I have purchased (the others being other brands) and am completely satisfied with my new Vaultek.
customer_reviews.author: Bidmeister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone who primarily owns handguns
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe for easy and secure storage of handguns and expensive personal belongings, providing quick access as necessary for trips to the range or, god forbid, a home defense situation. The technology works better than anticipated with seamless connection to my phone via the app. The smart key is also a very nice and convenient feature. I would recommend going with the biometric version, I have had no problems with the safe recognizing my fingerprint.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Best pistol storage/safe hands down
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but this is the best pistol safe I've ever purchased and have ever seen. Highest quality and ease of use bar none. Exceeded expectations and the moment I need another one for more pistols I will purchase a second one. I looked for a while for a safe that was purpose built for pistol storage and this is exactly that. Fits pistols from my Glock 17 with TLR-2 (with some wiggling to get it in) as well as the Glock 40 with RMR and Viridian laser/light combo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, but needs WiFi and Push Notifcations to support the price.
customer_reviews.text: The MXi is very cool, but I was surprised to find that it didn’t support WiFi with push notification through the app. I guess I should have done better research be for ordering, but for $600 (MXi unit, shipping, and additional gun and mag holder) I expected WiFi support. I saw the Bluetooth, but figured it was for set up and pairing. In my opinion for the price it should have WiFi with push notifications. Hell, my $150 doorbell and WiFi printer support push notifications, why cant this thing???
customer_reviews.author: Heather Morton

customer_reviews.title: Vaultek MX safe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safe, I like the interior lighting and the multiple ways to open the safe. Pricey but well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Gene

product_meta.title: Vaultek MX Series Safe High Capacity Smart Handgun Safe Multiple Pistol Storage Smart Safe with Optional Bluetooth or WiFi Alerts and Auto-Open Door and Rechargeable Battery
feature_bullets: Large interior can store up to (8) handguns. TOUGH AND RUGGED 14-GAUGE carbon steel construction and 12-GAUGE front door features a durable powdercoat finish to prevent corrosion and ensure long lasting protection.

ADVANCED ANTI-THEFT PROTECTION featured on all Vaultek safes includes anti-pry bars, Dual anti-impact latches, and IMPACT DETECTION exclusive to MX SERIES for the ultimate prevention against break-ins.

4-POINT ENTRY with the SMART KEY, rapid fire backlit keypad, Bluetooth app, and manual keys. INSTANT ACCESS to your valuables, documents, and firearm(s) with the automatic opening front door and pull out adjustable shelf.

SMART SAFE TECHNOLOGY uses the Vaultek Bluetooth App on your smartphone to view battery status, adjust the brightness of the interior light, unlock the safe remotely, view history log and more. LCD SCREEN provides quick visual feedback for all safe activity and RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM-ION battery provides power for 2 months, and charges in 2.5 hours with the included micro-USB charging kit.

MODULAR INTERIOR features a pull out height adjustable shelf and includes (1) twin pistol rack TPR-2. Customize your space and order additional accessories to store more handguns and magazines. RESPONSIVE LED LIGHTING for full view of your safe contents with the adjustable brightness interior LED lights.
